reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is an amazing professor who makes complex topics easy to understand. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be dry. Prepare to put in extra effort outside of class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is a great professor, but her exams are tough. Make sure to study the lecture notes thoroughly.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is enthusiastic and makes the subject interesting, but the labs can be overwhelming.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very engaging and encourages critical thinking. However, her grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor with a deep understanding of the subject. His assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Adams brings history to life with her engaging lectures. She's very approachable and helpful.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are clear and well-structured, but the material can be dry at times.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is a thoughtful professor who encourages deep thinking and discussion. Her classes are intellectually stimulating.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green is passionate about the subject, but his lectures can be disorganized at times.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is an excellent professor who makes sociology relevant and interesting. Highly recommend taking her class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. White's lectures are fascinating and well-organized. He makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is a knowledgeable professor, but her lectures can be a bit dry. The material is interesting though.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is passionate about the environment and his enthusiasm is contagious. His projects are very hands-on.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. King is an inspiring professor who makes art history come alive. Her assignments are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is a great professor who makes astronomy fascinating. His classes are a must for anyone interested in space.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor is very organized and makes statistics understandable. However, the homework load can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Allen has a lot of real-world experience and brings that into his lectures. His classes are very practical.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is a dynamic professor who makes marketing fun and engaging. Her projects are very creative.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson is a tough but fair professor. His exams are challenging, but you will learn a lot from his class.
